content.html: Elon Musk has enhanced his own freedom - to wield power and shape the world in his own image. Will he enhance anyone else's? As a general rule, billionaires gain power at our expense.
content.value:
Elon Musk has enhanced his own freedom - to wield power and shape the world in his own image. 

Will he enhance anyone else's? 

As a general rule, billionaires gain power at our expense.
